text: Celsa Fabiola Sandoval Barrientos (born 27 May 1999), known as Fabiola Sandoval, is a Paraguayan footballer who plays as a midfielder for Chilean club Colo-Colo and the Paraguay women's national team. ==International career== Sandoval represented Paraguay at the 2018 South American U-20 Women's Championship and the 2018 FIFA U-20 Women's World Cup. ===International goals=== Scores and results list Paraguay's goal tally first {| class="wikitable" |- ! No. !! Date !! Venue !! Opponent !! Score !! Result !! title: Fabiola Sandoval
